title: [1.12-1.11.2][汉化][TMC——更多实用的鸡]让我们一起来吃鸡233~
author: 黄狗dalao
txt_content:
本帖最后由 黄狗dalao 于 2018-2-7 18:05 编辑 

Too Many Chikens[TMC]
你有没有厌倦采矿或者收集某些资源？
TMC将会帮助你收集这些资源！
TMC在minecraft增加了49种鸡
这些鸡将帮助你获得这些特殊的资源
从此生存只靠养鸡致富！
[鸡肉嘎嘣脆，一起来吃鸡吧]
特点:
-矿石和其他材料的鸡
-有液体和经验的鸡，改善你的游戏
-100%和平生存的制作鸡蛋
-在特殊情况下生产的鸡



每一只鸡的完整描述
戳我
什么不会英语?
那我自己说了[只讲一些不能通过工作台制作的鸡]
黑曜石鸡-把水鸡扔在岩浆里会变成黑曜石鸡
玻璃鸡-把沙子鸡扔在岩浆亦或者是火焰里会变成玻璃鸡
砖鸡-把泥土鸡扔在火焰亦或者岩浆里面变成砖鸡[地狱砖块也是如此]
木炭鸡-把橡木鸡扔在...[上面有了我也懒得打字]
复活节鸡-"你自己发现！:P" ----by 作者
除了白鸡以外其他的鸡都可以通过一定的资源制作
于是乎作者发了一个合成表
原帖合成表下载地址
还有我保存到云盘的合成表awa...
百度云盘合成表下载地址






MOD食用方法
喂喂大兄弟你确定你看过原帖了?
好吧应该没看
那我就直说了
1。去冒险进入森林，针叶林或草原生物群落！
2、找到白鸡，带它到你家。
3。得到你的第一个蛋，然后孵化和培育它们直到你得到一定量的蛋。
4、最后你做鸡的时候就要参考下上面的内容咯awa[合成表]。





WARNING
由于1.11我并没有拿去汉化
所以1.11的朋友去楼下找原帖楼下py帮忙汉化awa


The end
更新日志V1.7 for Minecraft 1.12 : 07/16/2017 3:49:39 pm
7/16/17New Features:

Added Glazed Chicken (Can lay any glazed terracota block.)

Added Melon Chicken (Lays melon pieces.)

Added Magma Chicken (Lays magma blocks.)

Added Milk Chicken (Lays milk eggs.)



Added Nether Quartz Ore Egg (can be smelt into 2 nether quartz!) 



Changes/Fixes:


Added crafting recipes for almost all chickens(except Glazed Chicken, Wither Chicken, White Chicken, Orb Chicken, Experience Chicken.)



Made everything fully stable.

Added Explosion to Boom Chicken, when right clicked with flint and steel.

Now you can get 2 water buckets from Water Chicken, by right clicking it with a empty bucket!

Now you can get 2 lava buckets from Lava Chicken, by right clicking it with a empty bucket!

Now you can get 1 milk bucket from Milk Chicken, by right clicking it with a empty bucket!



Removed Lapis Dust.




V1.6 for Minecraft 1.12 : 07/15/2017 11:33:38 am7/15/17Succesfully updated to 1.12

p.s there are no crafting recipes until next update, sorry! :/




New update is almost ready! : 07/12/2017 12:57:00 am7/12/17Elemental Chickens will appear and will be able to be found all around the world!
Full configuration for Skyblock and Skyland map types.
Something special will be added to some chickens! :p




V1.5 for Minecraft 1.11.2! : 04/09/2017 2:55:19 pm4/09/17New Features:
Added Easter Chicken!


Changes/Fixes:
Fixed Rose Chicken & Endstone Chicken don't lay items.

Fully implement Exp Orb Chicken.

Some small changes in code getting ready for 1.12!




V1.4 for Minecraft 1.11.2! : 03/18/2017 3:14:28 am3/18/17New Features:

Added Gravel Chicken

Added Endstone Chicken.

Added Red Sand Chicken. 

Added Frost Chicken.

Added Chorus Chicken.

Added Nether Wart Chicken.

Added Mushroom Chicken.

Added Red Mushroom Chicken.



Added Mycelium Chicken.

Added Ink Chicken.

Added Rose Chicken.



Changes/Fixes:


Changed chickens lay rate to 1 item per 2 minutes and Wither Chicken 1 item per 20 minutes.

Added Base class for all chickens that may be changed anytime.

Changed chance for getting chickens from 10-15% per egg to 75-80% per egg.

Now White Chicken can spawn in Biomes O'Plenty biomes.

Changed 80% of crafting recipes for most chickens.

Now TMC is 95% survival friendly!

Wither Chicken has been changed and it grew another head! 



p.s If you wan't to craft a Wither Chicken guess the recipe by your self! :p




V1.3 for Minecraft 1.11.2! : 03/10/2017 1:46:40 pm3/10/17New Features:


Added Water Chicken.

Added Lava Chicken.

Added Obsidian Chicken. 

Added Clay Chicken.

Added Brick Chicken.

Added Glass Chicken.

Added Nether Brick Chicken.

Added Nether Quartz Chicken.

Added White Chicken.

Added Brown Chicken.

Added Charcoal Chicken.



Added Lapis dust.

Added Crafting recipes for 90% of the chickens.

Added new mechanic for making certain chickens spawn.



Changes/Fixes:

Extended Laying time for certain Chickens.



p.s will be taking a two week break , so no updates for two weeks :p




V1.2 for Minecraft 1.11.2! : 03/08/2017 1:19:20 pm3/08/17New Features:


Added Creative tabs for ore eggs & materials.

Added Stone Chicken.

Added Andesite Chicken.

Added Diorite Chicken.

Added Granite Chicken.

Added Ore Eggs(Can only be smelted into ingots or gems).

Added crafting recipes for some eggs.


Changes/Fixes:

Cobblestone chickens no longer spawns instead of them now stone chickens spawn.
Some of the chickens now can lay ore eggs, that can be smelted into ingots or gems!




V1.1 for Minecraft 1.11.2! : 03/07/2017 2:14:02 pm3/07/17New Features:

Added Creative tabs for eggs and materials.

Added Diamond & Emerald Nuggets.

Added Eggs for almoust every chicken except experience.

Changes/Fixes:

Now every chicken has 4 health.

Glowstone,Wither,Blaze and Nether chickens now can spawn in the nether!





Diamond & Emerald, Gold and Iron Chickens will now lay nuggets in replacement for gems.

希望各位给原帖一颗钻石XD
本萌新才四级.
这是我第二次汉化MOD，请多多指教
下载地址在上面
也可以进这里https://pan.baidu.com/s/1i5S290p
